Package entities

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
entities.GameMap
public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
GameMap which holds variables which contains information continents, countries and neighbourhood between countries.

      p_controlValue - Control value of continent
      Returns:
      Positive response if continent added successfully

      Parameters:
      p_continentId - Continent id to be removed
      Returns:
      Positive response if continent removed successfully

      p_countryId - Id of country
      p_continentId - Id of continent where country present

    • showMapEdit

      public java.lang.String showMapEdit()
      method to show Map from Map file in specific representation in edit map phase print String of Countries, Continent, Corresponding neighbors
      Returns:
      l_finalData Table containing data in string format

    • showMapPlay

      public java.lang.String showMapPlay()
      method to show Map from Map file in specific representation in Game play phase print String of Countries, Continent, Owner, Armies present, Corresponding Neighbors
      Returns:
      l_finalData Table containing data in string format

    • fillCountryData

      public java.lang.String[] fillCountryData​(Country p_country, boolean p_isEdit)
      method to fill country data for each country
      Parameters:
      p_country - country for which data is to be present
      p_isEdit - true if showMap called in edit phase, false if called in gameplay phase
      Returns:
      array of data of the specific country i.e. Country name, Continent Name and it's neighbors

    • saveMap

      public java.lang.String saveMap​(java.lang.String p_fileName)
      method to write map to file
      Parameters:
      p_fileName - File name
      Returns:
      Positive response if map written to file successfully
